name: FallenCore
description: FallenCore is a 2D platformer about Ardi the repair android, who arrived on a huge space station to fix the malfunctioned central core of the ship. After the breakdown, many on-board mechanisms became dangerous and can easily kill the character, as well as the robots "went crazy" and arranged a hunt for Ardi not to let it get...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 2.20GHz Memory: 2GB+ MB RAM Graphics: Graphics card with at least 512 mb DirectX: Version 9.0 Sound Card: Integrated Audio
